mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART (C_NO, C_AMOUNT, C_PRICE, C_PNO, C_MNO) VALUES (CART_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{c_Amount}, #{c_Price}, #{c_Pno}, #{c_Mno})
mapper.select: SELECT C.*, (SELECT M_NICK FROM MEMBER WHERE M_NO = C.C_MNO) C_NICK, (SELECT P_NAME FROM PRODUCT WHERE P_NO = C.C_PNO GROUP BY P_NAME) P_NAME, (SELECT P_PRICE FROM PRODUCT WHERE P_NO = C.C_PNO) P_PRICE FROM CART C WHERE C_MNO = #{c_Mno}
